WorkItem.ClosedComment: I’m closing the issue, as this has been fixed in the Hands-On Lab, by  adding a step mentioning that code for displaying the shell should be included in the InitializeShell method.
WorkItem.Description:
WPF Hands-On Lab: Get Started with the Prism Library (updated) is missing a step to show the Shell.  May serve as a frustration point for users new to the Prism library as step 10 indicates the shell should show.
 
pagdoc@microsoft.com link at bottom of documentation was kicked back as invalid email.
